title: Advanced Troubleshooting Series-Parallel Circuits 4
comment: Points: 450 for correct + 150 for fast + 250 if minimal measures

pages.notes:
Labeled values:
   R1 = [sparks.unit.convertMeasurement(r1.nominalResistance + '立')]
   R2 = [sparks.unit.convertMeasurement(r2.nominalResistance + '立')]
   R3 = [sparks.unit.convertMeasurement(r3.nominalResistance + '立')]

questions.prompt: One of the resistors above is defective. Which one?
